Our Services

Comprehensive BIM Solutions

At EDBPL, we offer end-to-end Building Information Modeling (BIM) consultancy services tailored to meet the unique needs of your construction and infrastructure projects. Our expertise spans across various domains, from architectural design to facility management, ensuring a seamless digital transformation of your project lifecycle.

3D Modeling 4D Scheduling 5D Cost Analysis 6D Sustainability 7D Facility Management

1D and 2D Services

Create detailed 2D plans that fulfill regulatory submission requirements and support initial designs. Accurate 2D representations ensure compliance and reduce upfront design errors.

3D BIM Modeling

Transform 2D blueprints into detailed 3D models that enhance visualization and team collaboration. Spot potential issues before construction begins, reducing costly errors.

4D Time Planning

Integrate project schedules with 3D models for construction sequencing and timeline optimization. Visualize construction progress and identify potential delays.

5D Cost Analysis

Link cost data to BIM elements for accurate quantity takeoffs, cost estimation, and financial planning. Monitor project costs in real-time.

6D Sustainability

Analyze energy performance, environmental impact, and sustainable design options. Achieve green building certifications and optimize lifecycle costs.

7D Facility Management

Integrate operations and maintenance data for efficient facility management. Track assets, schedule maintenance, and optimize building performance.

8D Safety

Incorporate safety planning and risk assessment into BIM models. Identify hazards, plan safety measures, and ensure regulatory compliance.

9D Lean Construction

Optimize construction processes, reduce waste, and improve efficiency using lean principles integrated with BIM methodology.

10D Industrialization

Implement industrial construction methods, modularization, and automation through advanced BIM integration and digital fabrication.

BIM Strategy

Define your project's goals and align BIM implementation with organizational objectives. Our strategic planning maximizes ROI and enables smoother execution.

Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to common questions about our BIM services

What is BIM and why do I need it?

Building Information Modeling (BIM) is a digital representation of physical and functional characteristics of a facility. It's essential for modern construction projects as it improves collaboration, reduces errors, saves costs, and enables better project visualization and management.

How long does BIM implementation take?

Implementation timeline varies based on project scope and complexity. Typically, basic implementation takes 2-3 months, while full enterprise-wide implementation may take 6-12 months. We provide a detailed timeline during initial consultation.

What software do you use for BIM?

We utilize industry-leading software including Autodesk Revit, Navisworks, and BIM 360. Our team is proficient in multiple platforms and can adapt to your preferred software environment.

What training do you provide?

We offer comprehensive training programs including basic BIM concepts, software usage, and advanced modeling techniques. Training can be customized to your team's needs and skill level.

What support do you offer after implementation?

We provide ongoing technical support, regular check-ins, and maintenance services. Our team is available 24/7 to address any issues and ensure smooth operation of your BIM systems.

How do you ensure data security?

We implement robust security measures including encrypted data storage, secure access controls, and regular backups. All our processes comply with industry standards and regulations for data protection.
